name: Romaine and Mandarin Orange Salad with Poppy Seed Dressing
author: Joni B.
summary: I always get rave reviews when I serve this simple salad with a zesty poppy seed dressing! I often don't use the full amount of dressing, as I prefer less.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) can mandarin orange segments, drained
directions: Place bacon in a large, deep skillet
Cook over medium high heat until evenly brown
Place vinegar, sugar, red onion, mustard powder, and salt into the bowl of a blender
Cover, and puree on high until smooth
Reduce blender speed to medium-low; slowly pour in the vegetable oil and blend until incorporated and the dressing is creamy
Stir in the poppy seeds and set aside
To serve, toss the romaine in a large bowl with the crumbled bacon, Mandarin oranges, and enough dressing to moisten
Place onto salad plates and sprinkle with toasted almonds
